statements: SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE aisle_number = 5;
SELECT product_name, product_category, quantity_in_stock FROM warehouse_layout WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100;
SELECT aisle_number, shelf_number, product_name FROM warehouse_layout WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, last_stocked_date FROM warehouse_layout WHERE last_stocked_date > '2021-10-01';
SELECT aisle_number, shelf_number, quantity_in_stock FROM warehouse_layout WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY aisle_number DESC, shelf_number ASC
SELECT product_name, product_category, quantity_in_stock FROM warehouse_layout WHERE last_stocked_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, aisle_number, shelf_number, product_name FROM warehouse_layout WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY aisle_number, shelf_number
SELECT aisle_number, SUM(quantity_in_stock) AS total_quantity FROM warehouse_layout GROUP BY aisle_number
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' OR product_category = 'Accessories' ORDER BY product_category, last_stocked_date DESC
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout
SELECT warehouse_name, aisle_count FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_id = 1
SELECT warehouse_id, aisle_count, warehouse_name FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY aisle_count DESC
SELECT * FROM order_details
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_details WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, aisle_count FROM warehouse_layout WHERE aisle_count > 10 ORDER BY warehouse_name ASC
SELECT * FROM order_details WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT warehouse_id, COUNT(*) as total_orders FROM order_details GROUP BY warehouse_id HAVING total_orders > 5 ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, aisle_count FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_name LIKE '%ABC%' OR warehouse_name LIKE '%XYZ%'
SELECT * FROM order_details WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC, order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLocations;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM WarehouseLocations WHERE aisle_number > 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM Orders JOIN Inventory ON Orders.product_id = Inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLocations WHERE aisle_number > 5;
SELECT location_name, shelf_number FROM WarehouseLocations WHERE shelf_number < 10 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, product_name, quantity FROM Orders JOIN Inventory ON Orders.product_id = Inventory.product_id;
SELECT location_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM WarehouseLocations JOIN Inventory ON WarehouseLocations.location_id = Inventory.location_id GROUP BY location_name;
SELECT order_id, order_date, product_name, quantity FROM Orders JOIN Inventory ON Orders.product_id = Inventory.product_id WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout;
SELECT id, aisle_number, shelf_number FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE aisle_number = 2;
SELECT id, name, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_number, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT oi.id, p.name, oi.quantity, oi.price FROM OrderItems oi JOIN Product p ON oi.product_id = p.id WHERE oi.quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE aisle_number = 3 ORDER BY shelf_number DESC;

SELECT Product.name, Product.price, Orders.order_date FROM Product JOIN OrderItems ON Product.id = OrderItems.product_id JOIN Orders ON Orders.id = OrderItems.order_id WHERE Orders.customer_id = 123 ORDER BY Orders.order_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT aisle_number, shelf_number FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE product_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT Orders.order_number, SUM(OrderItems.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Orders JOIN OrderItems ON Orders.id = OrderItems.order_id GROUP BY Orders.order_number HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT Product.category, AVG(Product.price) AS average_price, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Product GROUP BY Product.category ORDER BY average_price DESC, total_products ASC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name FROM warehouse_layout WHERE location='New York';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id FROM order WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT warehouse_id, product_id, quantity FROM warehouse_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY warehouse_id, product_id;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id FROM "order" WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT product.product_name, order_item.quantity, warehouse_inventory.quantity FROM product JOIN order_item ON product.product_id = order_item.product_id JOIN warehouse_inventory ON product.product_id = warehouse_inventory.product_id WHERE warehouse_id = 1;

SELECT warehouse_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM warehouse_layout JOIN warehouse_inventory ON warehouse_layout.warehouse_id = warehouse_inventory.warehouse_id GROUP BY warehouse_layout.warehouse_name HAVING SUM(quantity) > 1000;
